summary: Build and enhance the 'Arun Events' responsive luxury-themed marketing website for balloon decoration services (Panchkula/Chandigarh/Mohali/Zirakpur), featuring a homepage banner slider with event photos, service sections with high-quality images, smooth animations, strong CTAs (Call/WhatsApp: 9696085369), social media icons, galleries, SEO, UX/performance polish, and basic security hardening.
architectural_notes: Static responsive HTML/CSS/JS website for 'Arun Events' with homepage categories, side menu, call/WhatsApp floating buttons, and separate category/gallery views.
Include prominent CTAs for Call/WhatsApp using the provided phone number (9696085369) across header and/or floating buttons.
Service locations displayed in the header/hero should be: Panchkula, Chandigarh, Mohali, Zirakpur.
Do not mention or label images as 'AI' anywhere in the site (UI text, captions, alt text, filenames, or marketing copy).

User requested generated (AI) photos for all event/category circle thumbnail images; must still comply with the rule to not mention or label images as "AI" anywhere in UI text, captions, alt text, filenames, or asset paths.
Replace any placeholder/question-mark ("?") images used for category circles/galleries with photo-style generated assets (no "AI" in filenames/paths/alt text/metadata).
Expand each event category’s configured image set to ~10 images (per category) so every category circle/gallery is well-populated.
Ensure the Call/WhatsApp number (9696085369) is also present in the footer/bottom section visible after scrolling (not only in header/floating buttons).
Ensure the site looks clear and properly sized on laptop/desktop and mobile (responsive image sizing/typography/layout so content is not blurry/cut off).
Homepage banner carousel should auto-slide (autoplay) as part of the slider behavior.
known_issues: Unwanted text appears in the UI; needs removal/cleanup.
Miscellaneous UI/content glitches reported by user; requires review and fixes.
Potential conflict: user requested "AI photos" while project requirements prohibit the word "AI" anywhere in UI text/metadata/filenames; ensure generated assets and references avoid "AI" wording.
Placeholder "?"-marked images are still present; must be removed/replaced with proper photo-style assets.
Black images are appearing in the UI; must be removed/replaced.
User requested to remove Banner #1 and remove all original images; confirm whether this means removing user-uploaded photos everywhere and using only generated assets.
User-uploaded photos are not displaying correctly; user wants them removed and replaced with generated images (10 per event category).

existing_features.title: Build the Arun Events homepage UI in React + Tailwind to match the provided HTML layout: sticky header (hamburger menu, brand title, service locations), slide-in left side menu with category links and a call link, a hero banner area, a responsive 2x4 category grid (2 columns mobile, 4 columns desktop), and floating Call + WhatsApp buttons.

Implement a homepage banner slider/carousel that cycles through multiple banner images with smooth transitions, touch swipe support on mobile, and accessible controls (previous/next buttons and/or dots) and supports auto-play with pause on user interaction.

Create clickable event categories (Birthday Decor, Anniversary Decor, Welcome Baby, Baby Shower, Car Boot Decor, Naming Ceremony, Kids Birthday, Bachelor Decor) so that clicking a category navigates to a dedicated category gallery view that displays the related photos in a responsive grid with a simple lightbox (tap to open, next/prev, close).

Add a simple, maintainable way to plug in user-provided photos for (a) the banner slider and (b) each category gallery without changing UI code (e.g., a single frontend configuration/data file that maps categories to image filenames).

Implement SEO basics for the site: set per-page document titles and meta descriptions in English, add semantic headings/landmarks, include Open Graph/Twitter meta tags for sharing, and ensure a crawlable structure for category pages.

Improve smoothness/UX/performance: add tasteful motion (without causing jank), ensure responsive spacing/typography, use image optimization best practices (dimensions, lazy-loading, async decoding), and ensure good Lighthouse-style basics (no layout shift in banner/category images).

Apply basic security hardening appropriate for a static marketing site: remove reliance on third-party CDN icon CSS, ensure all external links use safe attributes, and document recommended security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options, Referrer-Policy) for deployment on the Internet Computer asset canister.

Establish a coherent visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) aligned with an events/decoration brand and apply it consistently across header, menu, cards, buttons, slider controls, and gallery (avoid blue/purple as primary colors).

Add a clear, maintainable way to plug in the user’s balloon decoration photos so they appear in (1) the homepage banner carousel and (2) each event/category circular thumbnail image on the homepage, without changing component code each time photos are updated.
Update the site’s homepage and category gallery user-facing marketing copy to focus on balloon decoration services (English), while keeping the existing navigation/categories structure intact.

Update the homepage banner carousel to use the uploaded photos by changing frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts so siteMedia.banners points to a curated subset of the uploaded images (at least 3 distinct banner images) using their new /assets/user-photos/balloon-decoration/... paths.

Update category thumbnail images on the homepage to use uploaded photos by changing frontend/src/config/siteData.ts (the categories[].image fields) to reference the uploaded photos from /assets/user-photos/balloon-decoration/... (one thumbnail per category).

Populate category gallery pages with uploaded photos by updating frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts (siteMedia.categoryGalleries) so each category slug has at least 1 uploaded photo in its array (reusing uploaded images across categories is acceptable if needed).

Update the displayed service locations to exactly: Panchkula, Chandigarh, Mohali, Zirakpur (in that order) everywhere they are shown/used (e.g., header locations line and any SEO text that uses serviceLocations).

Strengthen SEO copy to target ‘top’ balloon decoration searches while keeping all user-facing text in English: update page titles/meta descriptions used by the SEO system so they clearly mention ‘Top Balloon Decoration’ and include all four service locations (Panchkula, Chandigarh, Mohali, Zirakpur). Apply this to the homepage and each category gallery page.

Ensure photos are present for all events/categories by confirming every existing category gallery has multiple photos configured and no category renders the 'Balloon Decoration Photos Coming Soon' empty-state under normal navigation.

Add a set of AI-generated event/balloon-decoration photos as static frontend assets and integrate them into the existing homepage banner carousel and category gallery pages via the existing configuration files (frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts).

Remove unwanted text and fix UI/content glitches across the site by auditing the homepage, category gallery pages, header/menu, and footer, then correcting any stray/placeholder text, visual artifacts, and obvious content issues while keeping all user-facing text in English.
Update the homepage banner carousel media list to remove Banner #4, #5, and #6 (i.e., remove the 4th, 5th, and 6th entries from `siteMedia.banners`) so only Banners #1–#3 remain in the slider.

Ensure the word "AI" (case-insensitive) is not mentioned anywhere in the app’s user-facing text or image metadata, and is not present in any generated image filenames or asset paths used by the UI (including banner images, gallery images, OG image paths, and any alt text templates).

Replace the currently-referenced generated images for the Birthday, Anniversary, Welcome Baby, and Car Boot Decor galleries (and the 3 homepage banners) with new photo-style static images whose filenames do not include "ai", and update `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` to use the new filenames. Ensure these galleries still have multiple images each after the replacement.

Add new photo-style category thumbnail images (one per existing event category) as static frontend assets and update `frontend/src/config/siteData.ts` so every `categories[].image` points to the new generated thumbnail for its slug (birthday, anniversary, welcome-baby, baby-shower, car-boot, naming-ceremony, kids-birthday, bachelor).

Add two new photo-style image sets as static frontend assets: 3 square images for the Birthday gallery and 3 square images for the Anniversary gallery. Store them under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure the filenames and any embedded metadata do not contain the word "AI" (case-insensitive).

Update frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts so the Birthday and Anniversary category galleries each include exactly 3 new generated images (the new sets created in REQ-25). Keep the existing user-uploaded photos in those galleries, but replace the current single generated placeholder image entry for each of these two categories with the new 3-image set.

Remove any placeholder/invalid image entries (including any '?' marked photos) from all category galleries and thumbnails so no broken or placeholder images appear anywhere in the UI (homepage category circles and category gallery pages).

Add additional photo-style generated images as static assets and update frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts so that every existing category gallery (birthday, anniversary, welcome-baby, baby-shower, car-boot, naming-ceremony, kids-birthday, bachelor) contains exactly 10 images total.

Add a visible bottom-of-page (scroll-down) contact section in the existing footer that displays the phone number "9696085369" and provides clickable Call and WhatsApp actions using the existing `siteData.phone` and `siteData.whatsappLink` values.

Remove all black images from the UI by auditing all currently referenced banner, category thumbnail, and gallery image paths and updating configuration so that no black/blank images are referenced or rendered anywhere (homepage carousel, homepage category thumbnails, category gallery grids, and lightbox). Replace removed images with non-black alternatives while keeping existing structure intact.

Update `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` so the homepage banner carousel no longer includes Banner #1 by removing the first banner entry (`/assets/generated/banner-1.dim_1600x900.png`) from `siteMedia.banners`, leaving the remaining banners in order.

Remove all original/user-uploaded images from the site’s displayed media by updating `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` to eliminate every `/assets/user-photos/balloon-decoration/...` entry from every `siteMedia.categoryGalleries[slug]` array, and replace them with generated image paths under `/assets/generated/` so that each existing category gallery still contains exactly 10 valid images.

Add the required new generated photo-style gallery images as static frontend assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the filenames listed in Image Requirements, ensuring the filenames and embedded metadata do not contain the word "AI" (case-insensitive).
Update `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` so every existing event/category gallery has exactly 10 valid image entries, and ensure no gallery falls back to the empty-state under normal navigation.

Remove any non-working user-provided photo references from the site’s displayed media by ensuring no `/assets/user-photos/...` paths are referenced by `frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts` or `frontend/src/config/siteData.ts`.

Improve responsive sizing/clarity so the website content and images look clean and readable on phone, laptop, and desktop by adjusting layout spacing, image sizing, and typography where needed (without changing routes or removing existing sections).

Remove the word "delivery" from all user-facing website copy and replace it with service-website-appropriate wording (e.g., "on-time setup" / "on-time service"), ensuring all displayed text remains in English.

Ensure the homepage banner carousel auto-slides (autoplays) by default when there are 2+ banner images configured, while keeping existing pause-on-user-interaction behavior (hover/focus/touch interaction should pause and manual next/previous controls should still work).

Remove the word "delivery" from all user-facing website copy and replace it with service-appropriate wording in English (use "on-time service" and/or "on-time setup" depending on context), ensuring the site reads like a service website.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate user-provided photos across the site (banner + event/category images)
Add banner image slider/carousel on homepage
Create clickable event categories (Birthday, Welcome Baby, etc.) that open pages/sections showing related photos (gallery)
Implement SEO improvements (meta tags, titles/descriptions, semantic structure, etc.)
Improve smoothness/UX/performance (polish UI interactions, responsiveness, load optimization)
Apply basic security hardening for the static site (safe external links, headers guidance, input-safety if forms added later)
Align site content/branding to balloon decoration services and use balloon-decoration photos for the homepage banner and category circle images
Add social media icons/links for Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube in the site header/footer or dedicated section
Add an optional customer testimonials section on the homepage for credibility

Add the 10 user-uploaded photos (IMG_9135.png, IMG_9135-1.png, IMG_9135-2.png, IMG_9116-1.jpeg, IMG_9118.jpeg, IMG_9116-2.jpeg, IMG_9116-3.jpeg, IMG_9116-4.jpeg, IMG_9116-5.jpeg, IMG_9060.jpeg) as static frontend assets under a dedicated directory (e.g., frontend/public/assets/user-photos/balloon-decoration/), preserving filenames.
Ensure all user-facing text remains in English and keep the existing page structure and routing intact while integrating the uploaded photos (no new categories or route changes).
Update displayed service locations to include Zirakpur (Panchkula, Chandigarh, Mohali, Zirakpur) across relevant UI areas
Add AI-generated event photos to enhance the site imagery (where suitable, e.g., banners/galleries)
Remove unwanted text and fix other UI/content glitches across the site
Remove homepage banner images #4, #5, and #6 from the banner slider/carousel (keep only desired banners).

Generate and integrate new (non-AI-labeled) photo-style images for Birthday, Anniversary, Welcome Baby, Home Decor, and Car Decor galleries/banners; ensure the word 'AI' is not mentioned anywhere in UI/captions/filenames/alt text.
Fill all event/category circle thumbnail images (e.g., Birthday, Anniversary, Welcome Baby, etc.) with generated photo-style images (user requested AI photos)

Remove placeholder "?"-marked photos from the site and replace them with photo-style generated images for each event/category circle thumbnail and related galleries, expanding to ~10 images per category as requested
Add the phone number (9696085369) in the lower/scroll-down section of the site (e.g., footer/bottom CTA) so it’s visible when users scroll down
Remove/replace any black images appearing anywhere on the site (banners, category thumbnails, galleries)
Remove Banner #1 (and its displayed name/label if shown) from the homepage banner slider
Remove all original/user-uploaded images from the site (banners, category thumbnails, galleries) and replace with the preferred non-black photo-style generated assets
Enable homepage banner carousel auto-sliding (autoplay)
Remove 'Delivery' from the services/content shown on the website (keep it focused as a service website)
Update marketing copy to remove/replace 'Service on time' wording as requested (confirm exact replacement text)
